title: Mission Ready | Features and Functions
description: Built Smart and Built Tough. The Mission features the toughest hardware of any smartwatch on the market and the highest waterproof rating, thanks to its groundbreaking water resistant capabilities. Pair that with the watch’s rugged construction and a built-in standalone GPS and the Mission is your go-anywhere guide to adventure.
